course_description: This is an introductory course covering topics like affine and projective varieties, Hilbert's Nullstellensatz, morphism and rational maps of varieties, dimension, smoothness, algebraic curves, intersection multiplicity and Bezout's theorem. Topics from commutative algebra like integral extensions, Noether's normalisation lemma and primary decomposition will also be treated simultaneously.
schedule_location: MW 1pm-2:15pm in Math & Science Center - E406
sections: Class Nbr: 2645, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: MW 1-2:15p, Instructor: B. Ullery, Status: Open
